/* cmmnBoard.selectContents */
SELECT BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , BOARD_GRP_SEQ boardGrpSeq , TITLE title , CONT cont , F_FILE_ID(ATCH_FILE_ID) atchFileId , F_FILE_ID(IMAGE_FILE_ID) imageFileId , DATE_FORMAT(RGST_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') rgstDt , RGST_ID rgstId , NOTI_YN notiYn , BOARD_CD boardCd , BOARD_DIVN boardDivn , VIEW_NUM viewNum , F_USER_NM(TB.RGST_ID) name , SECRET_YN secretYn , SITE_CLCD siteClcd , F_SITE_NM(REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SITE_CLCD,',',1),'[\\[\\]]','') ) siteClcdNm , CHAR_LENGTH(SITE_CLCD) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(SITE_CLCD,',','')) siteClcdCnt , ACPT_ST_DT acptStDt , ACPT_END_DT acptEndDt , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_ST_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') notiStDt , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_END_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') notiEndDt , YEAR year , STATUS status , PWD pwd , QNA_NAME qnaName , QNA_EMAIL qnaEmail , QNA_MBLP qnaMblp FROM T_BOARD TB WHERE USE_YN='Y' AND BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}

/* cmmnBoard.selectCount */
SELECT COUNT(TB.BOARD_SEQ) cnt FROM T_BOARD TB WHERE TB.USE_YN='Y' AND BOARD_SEQ = BOARD_GRP_SEQ AND BOARD_CD = #{boardCd}

/* cmmnBoard.subSelectList */
SELECT BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , BOARD_GRP_SEQ boardGrpSeq , TITLE title , CONT cont , F_FILE_ID(ATCH_FILE_ID) atchFileId , DATE_FORMAT(RGST_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') rgstDt , RGST_ID rgstId , NOTI_YN notiYn , BOARD_CD boardCd , BOARD_DIVN boardDivn , VIEW_NUM viewNum , F_USER_NM(TB.RGST_ID) name , SITE_CLCD siteClcd FROM T_BOARD TB WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_GRP_SEQ = #{boardSeq} AND BOARD_SEQ <> BOARD_GRP_SEQ

/* cmmnBoard.boardSeqSelect */
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(BOARD_SEQ)+1,1) boardSeq FROM T_BOARD

/* cmmnBoard.prevSelectList */ SELECT PA.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , TITLE title , @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum , CASE WHEN BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} THEN @rownum2:=@rownum END , @rownum2 rnum2
, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_ST_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_END_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') AND NOTI_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END notiYn
FROM T_BOARD TB , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE BOARD_CD = #{boardCd} AND BOARD_SEQ = BOARD_GRP_SEQ AND USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY notiYn DESC, BOARD_SEQ DESC ) PA WHERE rnum < rnum2 ORDER BY rnum DESC LIMIT 1

/* cmmnBoard.nextSelectList */ SELECT PA.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , TITLE title , @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum , CASE WHEN BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} THEN @rownum2:=@rownum END , @rownum2 rnum2
, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_ST_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_END_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') AND NOTI_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END notiYn
FROM T_BOARD TB , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE BOARD_CD = #{boardCd} AND BOARD_SEQ = BOARD_GRP_SEQ AND USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY notiYn DESC, BOARD_SEQ DESC ) PA WHERE rnum > rnum2 ORDER BY rnum LIMIT 1
